price: 61 Maudits à jamais, ils seront capturés où qu’ils se trouvent et exécutés jusqu’au dernier.
arabic: مَّلۡعُونِينَۖ أَيۡنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓاْ أُخِذُواْ وَقُتِّلُواْ تَقۡتِيلٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: malʿūnīna aynamā thuqifū ukhidhū waquttilū taqtīlan
